name: RebEarth
description:
This is our Metroidvania Month 16 entry.

After humanity was wiped out from earth by aliens, No-aH, the only surviving robot that contains all the data required to restore life on the planet, was kidnapped and imprisoned inside a high security alien facility. When a malfunction opens its cell, No-aH has to fight all the aliens that try to stop him and return to Earth to restore life.

  • arrow keys or WASD to move
  • W or UP is jump (and double jump)
  • Z - Fire
  • Space - Special
  • X - Cycle form down
  • C - Cycle form up
  • E - Pick Up object
  • F - throw object
  • Shift - Dash
  • Esc - pause menu
